about_the_game:
World of Shooting: Lifetime Shooting Club Member DLC gives several benefits:
- unlocks access to the weapons marked with the bage Club Member Only
- unlocks access to accessories marked with the bage Club Member Only

Important!
Club Membership doesn't unlock the items itself, users have to buy items using Exp.points.
Users have to unlock previous models to get access to the Club Member Only Item.
